decision_conditions:
<span style="font-size: 14px;">The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:&nbsp;</span><b><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 115%; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">: </span></b><span style="font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:Aptos;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-ansi-language:EN-GB;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA"><span style="font-size: 14px;">1557-01
( Site Location and Block Plans)</span><b><span style="font-size: 14px;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 14px;">1557-03 (Proposed Driveway), </span><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 14px;">1557-02 (Existing Driveway), </span><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 14px;">Reasonable Exemption Statement (Dated
10.10.2024)</span><b><span style="font-size: 14px;">, </span></b></span><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 115%; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;">Planning
and Heritage Statement ( Dated 29.08.24) and Replacement tree Details V- 2
(dated 04.12.24)</span>

The replacement of the existing Blue Spruce tree with the magnolia tree shall be undertaken in accordance with the approved particulars in the Replacement Tree Details ( Ver 2) submitted on 04.12.24 . The approved replacement tree shall be retained thereafter.&nbsp;
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Provision of replacement driveway; painting of all existing render and replacement of blue spruce tree
